classification.task_goal: To generate a comprehensive academic project on the impact of green marketing on consumer buying behavior in Nigeria.
primary_constraints: The project must include specific sections such as Introduction, Literature Review, Methodology, etc.
The Literature Review must use UWE referencing style for in-text citations.
classification.reasoning: The conversation maintained the task goal and constraints throughout, with the user providing clear instructions and the assistant responding appropriately without any violations of the specified constraints.
